hero.subhead: Clarify grid and bankability risks before investing in Romania. AFA Energy Romania is an independent technical advisory firm acting on behalf of the investor.
hero.disclaimer: AFA Energy Romania is an independent technical advisory firm; not a developer, EPC contractor, or broker.

intro.heading: Value Proposition
paragraphs: In the Romanian renewable energy market, the real value of a project depends on how well its paper design matches the actual grid capacity.
Grid conditions and connection costs that emerge during or after the ATR process directly impact investment economics.
Therefore, preliminary assessment must go beyond permit status to cover grid capacity, connection costs, and bankability thresholds.

metrics.note: These figures represent total technical assessments within the scope of ATR analysis, grid feasibility, and Pre-TDD.

atrMatrix.title: AFA ATR Matrix™ — Pre-Investment Technical Filter
atrMatrix.description: Our goal is not to show the project as 'technically possible', but to clarify if it is viable for investment. Not a software or platform.

cards.title: Connection Point Capacity & Evacuation Analysis

cards.title: Technical Permitting & Regulation Check

cards.title: Grid Connection Cost & Risk

cards.title: Bankability Verification
